title: What has happened to Platnium properties and if they have gone out of business what happens to the residents that have purchased land for the undeveloped communities
text:
Right now that's become a rather complicated dispute, our business
writer tells us.

Because this is just the beginning stages of what may become a
lawsuit, we can only say that once legal action is taken, we'll
report on it in the StarNews and StarNewsOnline.com. Thanks,
